Entity.name: UpdateBatch
Entity.DisplayName: displaykey.DisplayName.UpdateOps.Create + createUpdateOps.map(\ o -> o.EntityTypeName + "[" + o.ObjectUId + "]").join(",") + displaykey.DisplayName.UpdateOps.Delete + deleteUpdateOps.map(\ o -> o.EntityTypeName + " " + o.ObjectUId ).join(",") + displaykey.DisplayName.UpdateOps.FieldChange + fieldChangeUpdateOps.map(\ o -> o.EntityTypeName + "[" + o.ObjectUId + "]." + o.Field + "=\"" + o.Value + "\"" ).join(",")
